newsitem.title: USA: Stone Container Corp Q3 loss widens.
newsitem.headline: Stone Container Corp Q3 loss widens.

text.p: (All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
NOTE: Q3 1996 loss applicable to common shares $53.0 million vs loss $50.9 million.

Q3 1996 loss includes non-recurring charge of about $11.0 million or $0.11 a share related to sale of assets and an extraordinary charge of $3.0 million or $0.03 a share pertaining to early extinguishment of debt.
Q3 1995 includes $177.9 million, or $1.85 a share primary ($1.57 fully diluted) in extraordinary charges.
Q3 1996 loss before charges $47.7 million or $0.50 a share vs Q3 1995 earnings before charges of $129.0 million or $1.32 a primary share ($1.12 fully diluted).
Q3 and nine-month 1995 results restated to exclude Stone-Consolidated Corp, which effective November 1, 1995, became a non-consolidated affiliate.
(All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
NOTE: Nine-month 1996 net loss applicable to common shares $45.8 million vs profit $169.8 million.
Nine-month 1996 loss after $3.3 million or a $0.03 a share extraordinary charge.
Nine-month 1995 profit after $181.0 million or $1.95 a share primary ($1.55 fully diluted) extraordinary charge.
Nine-month 1996 loss before charge $36.5 million or $0.43 a share vs nine-month 1995 profit before charge of $356.8 million or $3.79 a share primary ($3.08 fully diluted).
